humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, two sentinel lymph nodes were examined and no tumor was found in either of them (0/2). The addendum immunohistochemistry stains for the sentinel lymph nodes also did not reveal metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, based on the given rules and the report, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that two sentinel lymph nodes were excised and examined, with no tumor seen in either node (0/2). Additionally, immunohistochemical stains for cytokeratin did not reveal metastatic carcinoma in the sentinel lymph nodes. Therefore, the patient's pathologic N stage is N0.
